tracks.text: Kesha wakes up in a bathtub, disheveled, missing her right shoe.
She steps out of the tub. Next to her feet is her missing cowboy boot and an empty bottle of Jack Daniels
She picks up her extra shoe. Her toenails are leopard printed.
She knocks a picture off the wall. It shows a family of 4, including 2 middle school aged children.
She comes down the stairs, where a family of 4 are eating breakfast.
The mom drops a plate of pancakes.
Kesha walks out the door.
The family follows her out. She gets on a bike covered in gold with spinning rims.
The bike is a Lowrider brand, with the vanity plate "MONEY", 4 horns, and an American flag.
She pulls up to kids sitting on the curb with a boombox. She points at the bike, the kids run over, and she picks up the boombox.
She sits in an alley way with the boombox.
A man eats a popsicle and smiles at her. She waves him off.
A man pulls up in a gold Trans Am.
The man wears shorts, an American flag fanny pack, a cut off shirt saying 'Dirt', and a pornstache. He opens the passenger door, and Kesha gets in.
The police pull over the car. Kesha climbs out of the car.
They cuff her while the driver laughs.
She dances in the passenger seat of the car, handcuffs on one hand, while it drives down the road.
In a club
She sits on alone on a carpet while confetti falls around her.
She raises her hands over her head
She's wearing a strappy, high stilletto.
She dances in the confetti, whipping her hair around.
She walks through a door, wearing a sparkly dress
A crowd of people dance in a dark room. There are posters on the wall, like in a college dorm.
College aged party goers dance and carry red solo cups
The Trans Am driver sits on a couch. A DJ works a mix table in a corner.
A man stands on a table and jumps, nearly hitting a ceiling fan.
She lies in a grungy bath tub, with gold confetti.
She's missing her left shoe.
